name: Makeover Match - Swap & Style
description:
Want a new kind of makeover experience? Transform people’s lives by solving challenging puzzles in Makeover Match - where beauty is more than just skin deep.

This relaxing and rewarding free match-3 game lets you help people rediscover their full potential with the Power of Positivity.

Join passionate host Emma as she navigates the choppy waters of TV to transform her vision into a reality: a makeover show that proves it takes more than some makeup, a haircut and a new wardrobe to overcome life’s obstacles.

Together with her crew of larger-than-life experts, discover how they snip, style and hammer their way to people’s hearts, while also empowering them to make the most of what they’ve got, be true to themselves and live their best life.

Makeover Match perfectly blends engaging mini-game puzzles with inspiring stories of personal growth, self worth and celebrating courage in the face of adversity. Seize the moment and be part of something special today!

MAKEOVER memorable characters, each with a story to tell that will entertain, thrill and move you.

CHOOSE from a wide range of stylish fashion and fabulous makeup to boost confidence and celebrate people for who they truly are.

DECORATE and renovate a variety of unique spaces and help people transform their lives for the better.

MATCH makeover items and solve hundreds of addictive match-3 and mini-game levels.

ENJOY surprising plot twists and hilarious dialogue along the way.

DISCOVER the manic world of TV. Go behind the scenes to meet huge egos, dramatic scenarios and extreme characters in an industry where anything can happen.

It is time to match the styles, solve the puzzles and start your Makeover Match!
